cpp11bigwig

cpp11bigwig provides read access to bigWig files in R using libBigWig. Data is read into an R data.frame.

Installation 

# Install development version from GitHub
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("rnabioco/cpp11bigwig")
library(cpp11bigwig)

bw = system.file('extdata', 'test.bw', package = 'cpp11bigwig')

read_bigwig(bw)
##   chrom start end value
## 1     1     0   1   0.1
## 2     1     1   2   0.2
## 3     1     2   3   0.3
## 4     1   100 150   1.4
## 5     1   150 151   1.5
## 6    10   200 300   2.0
